metadata.title: CVE-2024-35806 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: soc:fsl: qbman: Always disable interrupts when taking cgr_locksmp_call_function_single disables IRQs when executing the callback. Toprevent deadlocks, we must disable IRQs when taking cgr_lock elsewhere.This is already done by qman_update_cgr and qman_delete_cgr; fix the otherlockers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-35806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
